summary: Equal employment opportunity counselors provide employees with information on their rights and obligations under EEO laws. They also gather information from aggrieved employees, try to informally resolve issues, and more. The Department of Veterans Affairs is required to estimate how many counselors it needs per employee to effectively carry out these duties and report this ratio to Congress. VA hasn't done so. We recommended that...
title: Veterans Affairs: VA Should Develop and Report an Estimate of Needed Equal Employment Opportunity Counselors
